tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id UUID,
    progress_percentage FLOAT,
    total_playtime INTERVAL,
    last_played_at TIMESTAMP,
    achievement_unlocked BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id UUID,
    level INTEGER,
    experience INTEGER,
    last_played TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    achievement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    achievement_name TEXT,
    unlocked BOOLEAN,
    completion_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerProgress (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id UUID,
    level INT,
    experience INT,
    last_played TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerAchievements (
    achievement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    achievement_name TEXT,
    date_achieved TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    game_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress FLOAT NOT NULL,
    last_played_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    achievement_id INT NOT NULL,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    achieved_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, achievement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_info (
    game_id INT NOT NULL,
    game_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_rewards (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    reward_id INT NOT NULL,
    reward_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, reward_id)
);
CREATE TABLE player_information (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50), player_email VARCHAR(100), player_level INT);
CREATE TABLE player_achievements (achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, achievement_name VARCHAR(100), achievement_description TEXT, achievement_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE game_progress (player_id INT, game_id INT, game_level INT, game_score INT, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id));
CREATE TABLE player_inventory (player_id INT, item_id INT, item_name VARCHAR(50), item_quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, item_id));
CREATE TABLE game_catalog (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name VARCHAR(100), game_genre VARCHAR(50), game_release_date DATE);
